function opposite-direction aliased as gloubi, boulga

Description

Returns opposite-position of positions

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
positions list of positions list —

Returns

string | null

Throws

  • No opposite direction can be found for $direction.
  • Why not Zoidberg?

TODO's

  • Brush my unicorn
  • Buy a rainbow

Deprecated function clamp

Description

Clamp

Access

protected

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
value value to clamp number —
min minimum value number —
max maximum value number —

Returns

The clamped value

number | false

Signature

Author

Hugo "Sass" Giraudel
